summary: This is an email chain from July 15, 2020, in which attorney David Hakimfar inquires about obtaining the arrest record and mugshot of defendant Ghislaine Maxwell in the case 'People v. Maxwell'. The email includes standard legal confidentiality disclaimers.

persons.name: David Hakimfar
persons.context: Attorney at Hakimfar Law who sent an email inquiry seeking to obtain Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest record and mugshot.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the defendant in the case 'People v. Maxwell', for whom an arrest record and mugshot are being requested.

connections.description: Hakimfar is inquiring about obtaining Maxwell's arrest records, indicating a legal/professional interest in her case.

events.title: Inquiry for Maxwell's arrest records
events.description: Attorney David Hakimfar sends an email asking how to obtain the arrest record and mugshot of Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: Attorney David Hakimfar inquired about obtaining Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest record and mugshot on July 15, 2020.
The inquiry references the criminal case 'People v. Maxwell'.
The email includes standard legal confidentiality disclaimers indicating it is from a law firm.
